LanguageData.MetocarbineTolerance.label: Metocarbine tolerance
LanguageData.MetocarbineTolerance.description: Easy combat stimulator, almost non-addictive. Slightly increases combat performance, but does not have serious side effects. Within a few hours, subjects experienced an increased reaction and speed of decision-making.
LanguageData.MetocarbineHediff.label: Concentration
LanguageData.MetocarbineHediff.description: Easy combat stimulator, almost non-addictive. Slightly increases combat performance, but does not have serious side effects. Within a few hours, subjects experienced an increased reaction and speed of decision-making.

LanguageData.MetocarbineAddiction.stages.1.label: withdrawal
